title: Wolverine PS5: Will It Be Rated M? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.14.21
description:
Gary Whitta and Greg talk about if Insomniac and Marvel Games will go for the M rating on Wolverine, PS5's new firmware, and a couple of game delays!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:35 - Housekeeping
Janet’s nominated for TWO GameHer Award! Vote for Gameonysus at thegamehers.com/vote on Rising Star: Streamer and Content Creator: Top Journalist!
It's SUB-TEMBER On Twitch! Viewers across the platform throughout the month can take advantage of 20% off subscriptions for first-time subscribers and gifted subs. Your support means the world to us here at Kinda Funny and right now you can take advantage of this deal and receive benefits like ad-free viewing, sub emotes, and more.
PS I Love You XOXO posts tomorrow for an embargo.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:07:01 - Wolverine Details (Kinda), Kat Bailey @ IGN
00:17:37 - PS5 System Software Updates tomorrow, @ PS Blog
00:28:55 -  Ad
00:30:55 - Delays!
00:42:25 -  let’s put some bets down! Of these games, which do you think hit their release dates? - Best Friends Q:Mario
00:48:30 - Xbox Remote Play Update
00:51:02 - Driver is Getting a Live Action Series
00:57:33 - NEW SEGMENT: Can Kojima play it?
00:59:40 - Out today
01:02:15 - Squad Up:djKENTO(PS5) - itsDJKENTO
01:04:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy
